Description:
Go to Jail.
Go Directly to Jail.
Do not pass GO.
Do not collect {moneyValue goSpace}.
Make general repairs on your property. For each house, pay {moneyValue 50}. For each hotel, pay {moneyValue 300}

Advance to the next utility.
Pay the owner 10 times the amount showing on the die.
You may purchase the property if it is unowned.

Advance to the next train station.
Pay the owner twice what they are entitled to.
You may purchase the property if it is unowned.

Advance to the next train station.
Pay the owner twice what they are entitled to.
You may purchase the property if it is unowned.

Get out of jail Free card!
You may keep this card and use it to bail for free.
Take a trip to {boardSpace 5}. If you pass Go, collect {moneyValue goSpace}
